caption.p: Annual cycles of midHolocene minus piControl differences. The values shown are area‐weighted averages for grid points in the region 40° to 60°N and 30° to 120°E for the multimodel mean. The vertical bars extent to plus or minus one median absolute deviation (MAD, a robust measure of model spread) either side of the average. For clarity among the temperature curves, these are shown only for surface (or “skin”) temperature ( T surface).
